
# Recurence:
    a(0) = 1, a(n) = a(n-1) * (2n+1)^3 + (-1)^n * ((2n+1)!!)^3 / (2n+1)^3

# Definition:
    a(n) = ((2n+1)!!)^3 * Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^k/(2k+1)^3.

# Asymptotic:
    a(n-1) ~ Pi^3 * 2^(3n-7/2) * n^(3n) / exp(3n).

Cf. https://oeis.org/A291585

# Formula for A291585:
#   a(n) = a(n-1)*(2n-1)^3 + ((2n-1)!!)^3/(2n-1)^3, for n > 1.

Terms:
